hypothesis_content.title: Fear & Greed Extreme Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the Crypto Fear & Greed Index reaches extreme fear (≤20) during a NEUTRAL regime, a 5%+ BTC price reversal will occur within 3 trading days, providing a mean-reversion entry opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme fear readings in neutral regimes often represent overreaction to news or temporary sentiment shifts, creating buying opportunities as institutional and long-term investors accumulate at perceived discounts. The current news shows mixed sentiment (Schiff bearish vs steady XRP), suggesting potential for sentiment-driven reversals.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close below 20-day SMA but above 200-day SMA (NEUTRAL regime confirmation)
Entry on next 4-hour candle open after all conditions met

exit_conditions.time_exit: 72 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC price continues to decline >5% beyond entry point within 72 hours despite extreme fear reading, indicating genuine bearish momentum rather than sentiment overreaction.
